directions: Whisk 2 tablespoons olive oil, lemon zest, coriander, black pepper, ginger, salt, and cinnamon in a small bowl; rub tuna steaks with spice mixture.
Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear tuna in the hot oil until browned but still pink in the center, about 3 minutes on each side.
ingredients: 4 (5 ounce) tuna steaks, about 1 inch thick
title: Spicy Rub for Seared Tuna Steaks
